<h1>The ÜberTweak Team</h1>

<h2>Initial concepts</h2>

Joshua Bartlett - senior code oracle

Peter Hedges - icon design
Heather Woodcraft - senior technical consultant

Stephen Thorne - developer
Timothy Pollard - developer
James Redmond - developer
Magnon Damant - developer
Thomas Haines - developer
